scenes.description: Shiori Novella performs 'Abnormality Dancin' Girl' in a spooky 3D environment.
Shiori finishes her performance and talks with the Novelite mascots about her transformation and moving forward.

subtitles.original: 狂え、狂え、狂え
subtitles.english: Go mad, go mad, go mad

subtitles.original: ほとばしるさ
subtitles.english: It's gushing out

subtitles.original: 新しいワタシを
subtitles.english: My new self

subtitles.original: ほら見てよ
subtitles.english: Look, look at me

subtitles.original: ほら触れてよ
subtitles.english: Look, touch me

subtitles.original: 透明な服で着飾って
subtitles.english: Dressing up in transparent clothes

subtitles.original: 今サナギから蝶になるの
subtitles.english: Now turning from a chrysalis into a butterfly

subtitles.original: ありのまま全て見せつけて
subtitles.english: Showing everything exactly as I am

subtitles.original: 熱狂の舞台 演者はいない
subtitles.english: A stage of frenzy, there are no performers

subtitles.original: ならステップ刻んで
subtitles.english: Then keep the step

subtitles.original: One, two, three 踊らされるんじゃない
subtitles.english: One, two, three, I won't be made to dance

subtitles.original: 踊るのよ
subtitles.english: I'll be the one dancing

subtitles.original: さあ、さあ、さあ
subtitles.english: Come on, come on, come on

subtitles.original: 「異常」が胸を埋め尽くして
subtitles.english: Abnormality fills up my chest

subtitles.original: 普通じゃない自分になるの
subtitles.english: I'll become a version of me that isn't normal

subtitles.original: 歪んだ愛の成れの果て 創られた叶わぬ恋
subtitles.english: The wreckage of distorted love, a created unrequited love

subtitles.original: 「異常」「異常」が胸を埋め尽くして
subtitles.english: Abnormality, abnormality fills up my chest

subtitles.original: 普通じゃない自分になるの
subtitles.english: I'll become a version of me that isn't normal

subtitles.original: 自問自答 繰り返し 手に入れた
subtitles.english: Repeatedly questioning myself, I've obtained...

subtitles.original: 新しいワタシを
subtitles.english: ...my new self

subtitles.original: That wasn't a lullaby!
subtitles.english: That wasn't a lullaby!

subtitles.original: Eh? Are you sure?
subtitles.english: Eh? Are you sure?

subtitles.original: I'd give anything to be back in the library.
subtitles.english: I'd give anything to be back in the library.

subtitles.original: What do you mean? I fall asleep to that song all the time!
subtitles.english: What do you mean? I fall asleep to that song all the time!

subtitles.original: Oh! Well, it looks like it worked anyway!
subtitles.english: Oh! Well, it looks like it worked anyway!

subtitles.original: You have the last item!
subtitles.english: You have the last item!

subtitles.original: Oh?
subtitles.english: Oh?

subtitles.original: Oh nice! The beautiful purple heart!
subtitles.english: Oh nice! The beautiful purple heart!

subtitles.original: But what do I do with this now?
subtitles.english: But what do I do with this now?

subtitles.original: I think the Novelites are telling you to put the items in their slots on the table.
subtitles.english: I think the Novelites are telling you to put the items in their slots on the table.

subtitles.original: Ah, なるほど。All right, let's put this over here...
subtitles.english: Ah, I see. All right, let's put this over here...

subtitles.original: And then we got the microphone here.
subtitles.english: And then we got the microphone here.

subtitles.original: And then last but not least, we got...
subtitles.english: And then last but not least, we got...

subtitles.original: And here's my cauldron!
subtitles.english: And here's my cauldron!

subtitles.original: Uh, was something supposed to happen now?
subtitles.english: Uh, was something supposed to happen now?

subtitles.original: I think so! Mokoko?
subtitles.english: I think so! Mokoko?

subtitles.original: Ha! Ha! You did it Shiori!
subtitles.english: Ha! Ha! You did it Shiori!

subtitles.original: Now all the books in your archive have been activated!
subtitles.english: Now all the books in your archive have been activated!

subtitles.original: And you can go home!
subtitles.english: And you can go home!

subtitles.original: Yes!
subtitles.english: Yes!

subtitles.original: Oh! Oh!
subtitles.english: Oh! Oh!

subtitles.original: Those books have unlocked the power of our friendship!
subtitles.english: Those books have unlocked the power of our friendship!

subtitles.original: With all of us working together, we'll be able to reopen the portal!
subtitles.english: With all of us working together, we'll be able to reopen the portal!

subtitles.original: We work together? I think I did everything.
subtitles.english: We work together? I think I did everything.

subtitles.original: And then, Shiori approached the archway...
subtitles.english: And then, Shiori approached the archway...

subtitles.original: ...eagerly awaiting the moment when the combined strength of all of her friends would cause the portal to reactivate.
subtitles.english: ...eagerly awaiting the moment when the combined strength of all of her friends would cause the portal to reactivate.

subtitles.original: Oh! So I can, I can go home now, right?
subtitles.english: Oh! So I can, I can go home now, right?

subtitles.original: Uh... that's weird. The power of friendship usually works.
subtitles.english: Uh... that's weird. The power of friendship usually works.

subtitles.original: Eh?
subtitles.english: Eh?

subtitles.original: I know, right? Maybe after all this soul searching...
subtitles.english: I know, right? Maybe after all this soul searching...

subtitles.original: ...maybe we're really not friends, huh?
subtitles.english: ...maybe we're really not friends, huh?

subtitles.original: Maybe she needs to find an item to give her a plus three to the power of friendship?
subtitles.english: Maybe she needs to find an item to give her a plus three to the power of friendship?

subtitles.original: But what item? I think I used everything!
subtitles.english: But what item? I think I used everything!

subtitles.original: Why not check the cue cards instead? Oh, let me look them over.
subtitles.english: Why not check the cue cards instead? Oh, let me look them over.

subtitles.original: I hope it helps. I don't want to be stuck here.
subtitles.english: I hope it helps. I don't want to be stuck here.

subtitles.original: Mokoko! It says here that...
subtitles.english: Mokoko! It says here that...

subtitles.original: ...no matter how hard Shiori wanted to, she can't move backward.
subtitles.english: ...no matter how hard Shiori wanted to, she can't move backward.

subtitles.original: Eh?
subtitles.english: Eh?

subtitles.original: Sorry, that wasn't very helpful after all.
subtitles.english: Sorry, that wasn't very helpful after all.

subtitles.original: So what you're telling me is, I'm gonna be stuck in this Halloween-ish world, right?
subtitles.english: So what you're telling me is, I'm gonna be stuck in this Halloween-ish world, right?

subtitles.original: Yeah.
subtitles.english: Yeah.

subtitles.original: Don't worry Shiori, we're still here for you. Maybe there's a silver lining in all of this.
subtitles.english: Don't worry Shiori, we're still here for you. Maybe there's a silver lining in all of this.

subtitles.original: Okay, but I'm talking to a rock, two dogs and one bird.
subtitles.english: Okay, but I'm talking to a rock, two dogs and one bird.

subtitles.original: Well, when you put it like that...
subtitles.english: Well, when you put it like that...

subtitles.original: ...maybe this isn't so great.
subtitles.english: ...maybe this isn't so great.

subtitles.original: But this is just the start of this world!
subtitles.english: But this is just the start of this world!

subtitles.original: I bet if you keep moving forward, you'll discover that it's not as scary a place as it looks now!
subtitles.english: I bet if you keep moving forward, you'll discover that it's not as scary a place as it looks now!

subtitles.original: Yeah, that's true!
subtitles.english: Yeah, that's true!

subtitles.original: Plus you've gained a whole new dimension, and yeah it's different, but it might be good, right?
subtitles.english: Plus you've gained a whole new dimension, and yeah it's different, but it might be good, right?

subtitles.original: Eh, I don't know. I mean, I look great.
subtitles.english: Eh, I don't know. I mean, I look great.

subtitles.original: But I still like the old me.
subtitles.english: But I still like the old me.

subtitles.original: You're still the old you too, you know? You just got extra stuff now...
subtitles.english: You're still the old you too, you know? You just got extra stuff now...

subtitles.original: ...and you're on the next part of your story.
subtitles.english: ...and you're on the next part of your story.

subtitles.original: Yeah, I guess you do have a point.
subtitles.english: Yeah, I guess you do have a point.

subtitles.original: But you know, I wanted my character arc to be done.
subtitles.english: But you know, I wanted my character arc to be done.

subtitles.original: Sometimes I like having things stay the way they are.
subtitles.english: Sometimes I like having things stay the way they are.

subtitles.original: Is that really all you want?
subtitles.english: Is that really all you want?

subtitles.original: Well, duh.
subtitles.english: Well, duh.

subtitles.original: But if all the pages in your book just repeated over and over, you know, it'd get pretty boring, right?
subtitles.english: But if all the pages in your book just repeated over and over, you know, it'd get pretty boring, right?

subtitles.original: And even if it didn't, moving forward is how we grow.
subtitles.english: And even if it didn't, moving forward is how we grow.

subtitles.original: Yeah, and how we find new games to play, or memes to make!
subtitles.english: Yeah, and how we find new games to play, or memes to make!

subtitles.original: And how we gain new friends! We would have never met in the first place had we not taken a chance on change.
subtitles.english: And how we gain new friends! We would have never met in the first place had we not taken a chance on change.

subtitles.original: A new story would be boring without us, right?
subtitles.english: A new story would be boring without us, right?

subtitles.original: I guess. I mean, it's great having you guys as friends, and have the Novelites to keep me company.
subtitles.english: I guess. I mean, it's great having you guys as friends, and have the Novelites to keep me company.

subtitles.original: But you know, sometimes I just want to look back too. And if this is my book, then I should be able to decide what happens, right?
subtitles.english: But you know, sometimes I just want to look back too. And if this is my book, then I should be able to decide what happens, right?

subtitles.original: I want to go at my own pace.
subtitles.english: I want to go at my own pace.

subtitles.original: Hey Shiori, what's that on the bookshelf?
subtitles.english: Hey Shiori, what's that on the bookshelf?

subtitles.original: Huh? More books?
subtitles.english: Huh? More books?
